title: Character Creation
content: sguise help you eliminate your foes with deadly efficiency. Warlock The Fiend Yes Warlocks in service to fiends work towards corrupting, destructive ends - intentionally or otherwise - and receive hellish blessings in turn. The Great Old One Yes Warlocks bound to eldritch beings in the Far Realms work towards inscrutable goals, gaining strange powers over entropy and the mind.
